div.p:
The mission of the Forest Municipal School District is to provide all students a quality
education that develops the whole child to his or her greatest potential.

div.div: Parents, please fill out the 2019-2020 Parent/Family Survey. Link is attached in the story.
Forest Municipal School District will be closed for the remainder of the semester.
Feeding Program will be suspended effective today.

div.p: The Forest Municipal School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, sex, color, religion, national origin, age, or disability in the provision of educational programs and services or employment opportunities and benefits.
